text: The Hollywood premiere of Wonder Woman on Thursday got a double dose of Diana Prince. Gal Gadot, who plays the titular heroine in Patty Jenkins ’ film, joined original Wonder Woman actress Lynda Carter on the red carpet. Carter, who starred on the beloved TV series in the 1970s, previously teamed up with Gadot at the United Nations last year, when Wonder Woman was named an honorary ambassador for the empowerment of women and girls. ( The U. N. ultimately dropped that campaign two months later, after the initiative was met with criticism. ) “ In some magical and mystical way, there lies within each of us Wonder Woman, ” Carter said at the time. “ She is real.
